statements: SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT property_owner_id, coverage_type FROM policy_details;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Home';
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, property_owner_id, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_details ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_details WHERE property_owner_id = 10 ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE property_owner_id = 5 AND coverage_type = 'Home';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY coverage_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT policy_id, owner_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_details ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, owner_name, coverage_amount, start_date FROM policy_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_details WHERE coverage_amount >= 5000;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM coverage_info ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, owner_name, coverage_amount, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM coverage_info WHERE coverage_type = 'Homeowners' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_id, owner_name, coverage_type FROM policy_details JOIN coverage_info ON policy_id = property_owner_id WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name, coverage_type, premium_amount FROM policy_details JOIN coverage_info ON policy_id = property_owner_id ORDER BY coverage_type, owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT policy_id, property_owner_id, property_address FROM policy_details WHERE policy_type = 'Home';
SELECT coverage_id, policy_id, coverage_type FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, owner_email FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_details JOIN coverage_details ON policy_details.policy_id = coverage_details.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT policy_id, property_owner_id, policy_type FROM policy_details WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, property_address, policy_type FROM policy_details WHERE property_owner_id = 100;
SELECT coverage_id, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 500;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, owner_phone FROM property_owners WHERE owner_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT policy_number, insured_owner_id FROM policy_details WHERE property_id = 123;
SELECT amount_covered, coverage_type FROM coverage_details WHERE policy_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM property_details WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM owner_details WHERE owner_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM policy_details;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, property_id, insured_owner_id FROM policy_details WHERE policy_id > 100;
SELECT policy_id, policy_number, address, city, state, zipcode FROM policy_details JOIN property_details ON policy_details.property_id = property_details.property_id;
SELECT policy_id, coverage_id, coverage_type, amount_covered FROM policy_details JOIN coverage_details ON policy_details.policy_id = coverage_details.policy_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, policy_number FROM owner_details JOIN policy_details ON owner_details.owner_id = policy_details.insured_owner_id WHERE policy_number LIKE '%A%';
SELECT * FROM insured_property_owners;
SELECT name, address FROM insured_property_owners WHERE id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT coverage_info.coverage_id, coverage_types.type_name, coverage_info.premium FROM coverage_info JOIN coverage_types ON coverage_info.type_id = coverage_types.type_id;
SELECT detail_id, property_address, property_value FROM policy_details WHERE property_value < 100000;
SELECT * FROM insured_property_owners WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, coverage_amount FROM policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT pd.detail_id, pt.type_name, ci.premium FROM policy_details pd JOIN coverage_types pt ON pd.property_address = pt.type_name JOIN coverage_info ci ON pd.policy_id = ci.policy_id;
SELECT po.policy_id, co.type_name, co.premium FROM policies po JOIN coverage_info co ON po.policy_id = co.policy_id WHERE co.premium < 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT io.name, po.policy_type FROM insured_property_owners io JOIN policies po ON io.id = po.owner_id WHERE po.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
